title: The "Weak" Subject: On Modernity, Eros, and Women's Playwriting
description: The "Weak" Subject is the first comparative study of dramatic literature by modern women. This study demonstrates that there is such a thing as feminist realism; that this style empowers women; and that it is a vehicle of their interconnectedness beyond cultural specificities.
author: Serena Anderlini-D'Onofrio
